pages.text: A light-colored mushroom called $(o)Inosperma erubescens$() that appears harmless but is deadly if eaten. It is not common, but should always be avoided, as even touching it will result in poisoning.
This mushroom is white to light brown.
The caps of Deadly Fibrecaps are fibrous and these fibers can be removed. With a little skill, strings can be made from it.

pages.title: Poison
pages.text: Although the mushroom is not edible, its lethality can be used to create poison potions or poisonous arrows.
